narrative.narrative: Sky Gabon is a cargo airline based at Libreville,Gabon. From there it goes to Douala,Cameroon Pointe-Noire,Republic of the Congo Malabo,Equatorial Guinea and the domestic airport at Port-Gentil. These destinations range from 645 kilometers away from the hub at Pointe Noire to the nearest at 149km, the dometic one. This makes it a local airline. It had a leased Fokker F27 at 2013. The airline began in 2006.
